detail_desc: Cold shoulder dress in an airy weave with an elasticated flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Cold shoulder dress in an airy weave with an elasticated flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.

T-shirt in cotton jersey and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

T-shirt in cotton jersey and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

T-shirt in cotton jersey and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves. Wrapover at the back of the neck, cut-out section at the back and a seam at the hem with ties at the back.

Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves. Wrapover at the back of the neck, cut-out section at the back and a seam at the hem with ties at the back.

Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a deep V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves. Wrapover at the back of the neck, cut-out section at the back and a seam at the hem with ties at the back.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck wrapover front and short trumpet sleeves. Deep V-neck at the back ending in a hook-and-eye fastening and concealed zip, a wide, detachable tie belt at the waist and long, wide legs.
Short T-shirt dress in soft viscose jersey.
Short T-shirt dress in soft viscose jersey.
Short T-shirt dress in soft viscose jersey.
Short T-shirt dress in soft viscose jersey.
Short T-shirt dress in soft viscose jersey.
Short, padded jacket in a patterned weave with a zip down the front, welt side pockets and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Suede biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Zipped pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Suede biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Zipped pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Suede biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Zipped pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Short, straight-cut coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front and zipped pockets with a decorative flap. Lined.
Double-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric with a collar and detachable shoulder tabs. Pockets in the sides, a detachable belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Double-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric with a collar and detachable shoulder tabs. Pockets in the sides, a detachable belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Knee-length, pleated seersucker skirt with a wide, sewn-on tie belt at the waist, a concealed zip at the back and side pockets. Unlined.
V-neck top in a rib knit containing glittery threads with narrow shoulder straps.
Captain's cap in a felted wool blend with metal buttons at the sides and braiding at the front. Quilted lining.

Baseball jacket in viscose twill with sleeves in embossed imitation leather and embroidered appliqués on the back. Striped stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, welt side pockets, an inner pocket with a concealed press-stud, and striped ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Flock-print tights with an elasticated waist.

Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.

Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and narrow hems.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and narrow hems.
Slippers in soft suede with a hook and loop tab over the foot. Patterned fabric linings and soft suede soles.
Soft suede slippers with elastication at the top and lacing at the front. Imitation suede linings and insoles.
V-neck blouse in a jacquard weave with a drawstring and decorative gathers at the front and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Slightly shorter at the front.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a decorative opening and knot at the front. Seam at the waist, concealed zip in one side and straight, wide legs with pleats at the top.
Sleeveless dress in lace-embroidered mesh with an opening with a button at the back of the neck and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey underdress.
Dog jumper in a soft knit with a polo neck, ribbing around the front legs and an opening for the back legs.
Dog jumper in a soft knit with a polo neck, ribbing around the front legs and an opening for the back legs.
Dog jumper in a soft knit with a polo neck, ribbing around the front legs and an opening for the back legs.
Parka woven in a modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, diagonal zip down the front, a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button. Unlined.
Jumper for a dog in a jacquard knit with a ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs and back. Length at the top approx. 30 cm, circumference of collar 34 cm.
Short, sleeveless dress in sequin-embroidered velour with spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Knitted dress for a dog with pompoms on the back and ribbed flounces at the hem. Ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs.
Knitted dress for a dog with pompoms on the back and ribbed flounces at the hem. Ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs.
Knitted dress for a dog with pompoms on the back and ribbed flounces at the hem. Ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen and cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Fancy dress costume in jersey designed for a small dog. Lined hood with antennae, wings on the back, a hook and loop fastening at the neckline, ribbed sections around the front legs and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside.

Fancy dress costume in jersey designed for a small dog. Lined hood with antennae, wings on the back, a hook and loop fastening at the neckline, ribbed sections around the front legs and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside.

Rain jacket designed to fit a small dog with a collar, hole for a lead and a hook and loop fastening at the neck. Belt with reflective strips and a hook and loop fastening at the waist. Soft fleece inside.

Rain jacket designed to fit a small dog with a collar, hole for a lead and a hook and loop fastening at the neck. Belt with reflective strips and a hook and loop fastening at the waist. Soft fleece inside.
Trenchcoat woven in a cotton blend for a small dog. Collar with a hook and loop fastening at the neck and underneath.

Suit trousers woven in a linen blend with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and a zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and flounces at the top. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, adjustable shoulder straps and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit are recycled.

Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and flounces at the top. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, adjustable shoulder straps and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The polyamide and polyester content of the swimsuit are recycled.

Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a slightly wider, round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a slightly wider, round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and collar with sewn-on ties. Long sleeves, cuffs with a covered button, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Blouse in an airy weave with a small stand-up collar, a covered button at the top and buttons down the front concealed by a decorative flounce. Long sleeves with wide cuffs, a slit and covered buttons. Unlined.
Set with three glittery Alice bands, three pairs of glittery hair clips and ten hair elastics.

Set with a rain jacket and pair of rain trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric. Jacket with a detachable hood, zip down the front, side pockets and a reflective detail at the back. Lined. Trousers with an elasticated waist, adjustable tab with a hook and loop fastening at the hems, and reflective detail on one leg. Lined. The jacket and trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with long sleeves and press-studs down one side and at the crotch. Leggings with an elasticated waist and legs with sewn-on ears and ribbed hems.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit, T-shirt and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Wrapover bodysuit with short sleeves and press-studs at one side and the crotch. T-shirt with press-studs at the shoulders. Leggings with full feet, elastication at the heels and a foldover waist.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit, T-shirt and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Wrapover bodysuit with short sleeves and press-studs at one side and the crotch. T-shirt with press-studs at the shoulders. Leggings with full feet, elastication at the heels and a foldover waist.
Top in an airy viscose crêpe weave with a small frill around the neckline, short, frilled sleeves that slope downwards at the sides and a small opening and button at the back of the neck.
Top in an airy viscose crêpe weave with a small frill around the neckline, short, frilled sleeves that slope downwards at the sides and a small opening and button at the back of the neck.
Top in an airy viscose crêpe weave with a small frill around the neckline, short, frilled sleeves that slope downwards at the sides and a small opening and button at the back of the neck.

Sleeveless romper suits in soft organic cotton jersey with adjustable press-stud fastenings on the shoulders and a patch pocket at the top. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
